content.raw:
Thanks for reporting!

`huge_tree` was enabled in some calls and then omitted in others, which doesn't make much sense.
What I see we can do is either have it enabled everywhere or make it configurable through keyword arguments.
The former is supposed to be easier for the user, but the `huge_tree` kwarg is there for security reasons, so maybe we should respect that and go for the latter option.
